content: 2 double_crochet in same st fpdc around next 2 sts *double_crochet next 2 sts fpdc around next 2 sts* repeat to corner  2 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in chain 1 space fpdc around next 2 sts  repeat * to * to end of row 3 double_crochet in 3rd chain of previous row turn 18 double_crochet 12 fpdc 1 x chain 1 row 5  chain 3 2 double_crochet in same st fpdc around next 2 sts *double_crochet next 2 sts fpdc around next 2 sts* repeat to corner  2 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in chain 1 space fpdc around next 2 sts  repeat * to * to end of row 3 double_crochet in 3rd chain of previous row turn repeat row 5 until 40 60 along top 5180 70 along top row complete continue to edging alaskan waffle shawl © buttonnose crochet 2019 p ag e | 4 edging row 1  chain 1 does not count 2 single_crochet in same st chain 1 single_crochet next st  *chain 1 skip 1 st single_crochet in next* repeat to corner with 1 st remaining  chain 1 skip 1 st single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in chain 2 corner  repeat * to * to end with 1 st remaining chain 1 2 single_crochet in last st turn row 2  chain 1 2 single_crochet in same st *chain 1 skip single_crochet single_crochet in chain 1 space* repeat to corner with 1 st remaining  chain 1 skip single_crochet single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in chain 2 corner  repeat * to * to end with 2 sts remaining chain 1 skip next st 2 single_crochet in last st turn row 3 - 8  repeat row 3 fasten_off and sew in ends block if desired for pattern support please contact me using any of the following methods email buttonnosedesigns16@gmail com facebook https //www facebook com/buttonnosecrochet instagram https //www instagram com/buttonnose_crochet thank you for selecting a buttonnose crochet pattern if you have any questions in relation to this pattern please contact me via the above methods please feel free to share your projects on social media using the hashtag #alaskanwaffleshawl kind regards natasha disclaimer this pattern is for personal use only please do not share copy or redistribute any part of this pattern you may sell your finished items but please give buttonnose crochet credit © buttonnose crochet 2019 alaskan waffle shawl © buttonnose crochet 2019
